features.featureTitle: Configure the MusicPlayer to play the user-uploaded audio file for the track “Hum Tere Pyaar Mein — Lata Mangeshkar” by setting the runtime audio source (import.meta.env.VITE_HUM_TERE_PYAAR_MEIN_AUDIO_SRC) to the uploaded file’s public asset path, so clicking Play plays the real song (not the fallback tone).
